name: Tank Blaster!
description:
A third person shooter game with tanks!  This game is the outcome of the introductory project for students studying the Game_Dev course with Crimson Global Academy.  The game is created in Unity, and coded in C#, and was used to teach students basic 3D game development and coding.  Students learned how to control movement, shooting, collisions, animations, and game logic.  The enemy tank uses basic AI to control its movement and firing (it will move towards the player and fire when the player moves within a 'vision radius' of the enemy tank).

The students are now studying advanced game design, including procedural landscapes, algorithms and creativity in game genres.
